title: 3dAutobox
description: Computes size of a box that fits around the volume. Can also be used to crop the volume to that box.

prefix.title: Prefix name
prefix.description: Crop the input dataset to the size of the box, and write an output dataset with PREFIX for the name. If not used, no new volume is written out.

alt_input.title: Alternate input dataset
alt_input.description: An alternate way to specify the input dataset.

noclust.title: No clustering flag
noclust.description: Don't do any clustering to find the box. Any non-zero voxel will be preserved in the cropped volume.

extent.title: Extent flag
extent.description: Write to standard out the spatial extent of the box.

extent_ijk.title: Extent IJK flag
extent_ijk.description: Write out the 6 auto bbox ijk slice numbers to screen: imin imax jmin jmax kmin kmax.

extent_ijk_to_file.title: Extent IJK to file
extent_ijk_to_file.description: Write out the 6 auto bbox ijk slice numbers to a simple-formatted text file FF: imin imax jmin jmax kmin kmax.

extent_ijk_midslice.title: Extent IJK midslice flag
extent_ijk_midslice.description: Write out the 3 ijk midslices of the autobox to the screen: imid jmid kmid.

extent_ijkord.title: Extent IJKORD flag
extent_ijkord.description: Write out the 6 auto bbox ijk slice numbers to screen in a particular order and format. Useful for scripting.

extent_ijkord_to_file.title: Extent IJKORD to file
extent_ijkord_to_file.description: Write out the 6 auto bbox ijk slice numbers to a file in a particular order and format. Useful for 3dcalc expressions.

extent_xyz_to_file.title: Extent XYZ to file
extent_xyz_to_file.description: Write out the 6 auto bbox xyz coordinates to a simple-formatted text file GG: xmin xmax ymin ymax zmin zmax.

extent_xyz_midslice.title: Extent XYZ midslice flag
extent_xyz_midslice.description: Write out the 3 xyz midslices of the autobox to the screen: xmid ymid zmid.

npad.title: Npad
npad.description: Number of extra voxels to pad on each side of box.

npad_safety_on.title: Npad safety on flag
npad_safety_on.description: Constrain npad-ded extents to be within dataset.
